W01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After passing through the stone gate, you find a strange person who names you their enemy. Could this have something to do with your heart?

W01_EVAR_DIVA_AMANO_IWATO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_DIVA_AMANO_IWATO_000_DETAIL.text: A strange person refused to open the door to your heart. Best to visit another world for now.
